alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:02PM CDT until April 06 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CAMERON...SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS AND NORTHWESTERN VERMILION PARISHES... At 402 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lowry, or 10 miles southwest of Klondike, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lake Arthur, Gueydan, Klondike, Lowry and Thornwell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
